analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0xe3f4b4a5d91e5cb9435b947f090a319737036312.sol:
	Contract POPCHAINCASH has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0xe3f4b4a5d91e5cb9435b947f090a319737036312.sol#176-178)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
